message:
SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 49
How to use the software library?
• There are 3 configuartion files:
• nor.xml, for describing the non-ontological resource.
• prnor.xml, for describing the pattern for re-engineering.
• or.xml, for describing the ontology generated.
• There is a batch file
49
• prnor.bat, for performing the transformation
• Requirements
• Java runtime environment (tested in 1.5)
• You should set tha JAVA_HOME to the location of the 
installation directory. 
© A Method for Re-engineering Non-Ontological Resources for Building Ontologies 
Boris Villazón-Terrazas, Mari Carmen Suárez Figueroa
speaker: SYSTEM
